title: Of Mountains and Rivers - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Comedic Undertone   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Drugs   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Language Barrier   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests   Technological Gap   Underestimated Protagonist   World Travel
author: Priest
description:
A tale of an adventure between two people secretly in love with each other.

The story follows Chu Huan, a former secret service agent who was pursuing the ringleader of a drug trafficking group, “Big Ghost”, when he accidentally fell off a cliff. A series of bizarre adventures ensue.>
